alarmTrigger.title: Alarm trigger
alarmTrigger.description: Trigger alarm if AD-values goes below 700

alarmReset.title: Alarm reset
alarmReset.description: Resets alarm if AD-value goes above 800

leakageDetected.title: Leakage detected
leakageDetected.description: 1 if leakage was detected on port 1

leakageDetected2.title: Leakage detected 2
leakageDetected2.description: 1 if leakage was detected on port 2

leakageDetectedLast24.title: Leakage detected last 24 hours
leakageDetectedLast24.description: 1 a leakage was detected last 24 hours on port 1

leakageDetected2Last24.title: Leakage detected last 24 hours 2
leakageDetected2Last24.description: 1 a leakage was detected last 24 hours on port 2

durationLastAlarm.title: Duration last alarm
durationLastAlarm.description: Duration of the last alarm in minutes on port 1

durationLastAlarm2.title: Duration last alarm 2
durationLastAlarm2.description: Duration of the last alarm in minutes on port 2
